data.title: <a href='https://showtaste.herokuapp.com/'>ShowYourTaste - An Active Online Sneakers Platform
works: Built a RESTful API with Express.js and Node.js, deployed the server with Heroku and databases with Mongo Atlas
Completed  authentication/authorization  using  passport  and  middleware, CRUD and custom search function, encouraged users to post their sneaker and commented otherâ€™s posts
Design database relationship diagrams for sneaker, user and comment management, stored raw information data using Moogoose

data.title: Coronavirus Global Visualization Tracker
works: A website summarized information about Covid-19 via Data visualization by using React Hook and React-chart, enabled users to explore and predict the trendy of virus in the future
Developed  a  React  hook  front-end  with  real-time  virus  API  which  extracts  Json  data  and  provided infected, recovered and deaths cases number of the world from March, 2020

data.title: Promotive Daily Todo List -- Just do It
data.brief: Constructed soil water erosion predictors using Eureqa based on the Genetic Programming Algorithm
works: There's nothing you don't want to do, but something you have to do. Made todo plan for myself, self-driving and keep going
Enabled CRUD their daily todo plan and customize user to highlight each one of different priority
Developed the front-end by React, built the backend by Node.js and Express and used PostgreSQL as database
